name: This is What is True
description:
Nagomi McDaniel and Jaylen Hotdogfingers talk after the events of Season 10.

Light content warnings regarding being trapped in a small space, death, and burning alive.

-------------------------------------------------

Sometimes you sit down and realize you gotta make a fanfiction for a splorts game in twine.

Shout out to Stephen Dewey's Ten Candles, from which the final ritual phrase derives
